title: LINKIN PARK Really Wants You To Hear EMILY ARMSTRONG's Performance On Their New Record
description: There's an a capella version of their latest record coming.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 4 hours ago
excerpt: There's an a capella version of their latest record coming.
text: Linkin Park released their new record with vocalist Emily Armstrong in November, and they really wanna make sure you heard Armstrong's performance throughout. To do that, Linkin Park has announced they're released an a capella (or vocals only) version of From Zero this Friday. I'm not entirely sure the world really needs this, but hey – they're doing it and I cannot stop them. Linkin Park recently announced a gargantuan world tour featuring guests Queens Of The Stone Age, Spiritbox, AFI, Architects, grandson, Jean Dawson, JPEGMAFIA, and PVRIS on select dates. html:
Linkin Park released their new record with vocalist Emily Armstrong in November, and they really wanna make sure you heard Armstrong's performance throughout. To do that, Linkin Park has announced they're released an a capella (or vocals only) version of From Zero this Friday. I'm not entirely sure the world really needs this, but hey – they're doing it and I cannot stop them.

Linkin Park recently announced a gargantuan world tour featuring guests Queens Of The Stone Age, Spiritbox, AFI, Architects, grandson, Jean Dawson, JPEGMAFIA, and PVRIS on select dates. Tickets are available here.
